member.name: WICPngIccpProperties
member.summary: Specifies the Portable Network Graphics (PNG) iCCP chunk metadata properties.

member.name: WICPngIccpProperties.WICPngIccpProfileName
member.summary: [VT_LPSTR] Indicates the International Color Consortium (ICC) profile name.

member.name: WICPngIccpProperties.WICPngIccpProfileData
member.summary: [VT_VECTOR | VT_UI1] Indicates the embedded ICC profile.
